reviews.author: Shorb Family
reviews.review: Flooding in bathroom.  Immediately responded to request and fixed within a few hours.  Respectful of our schedule/needs over their time.   Maintenance here is wonderful and responsive every time.  Small or big issues.

ownerResponse.text: Hello Rinda! :) Thank you so much for your 4-Star Review! We greatly value your feedback and are glad you have chosen Elevate as your home. Please let us know if there's anything else we can do to help make Elevate a great place for our residents. Thank you!

reviews.author: Daniel
reviews.review: Great place to live - the gym is great, but heavier weights would make it exceptional. The place is always kept very clean, all problems addressed immediately, things that do break are fixed within the same day.

reviews.author: Taryn Mindt
reviews.review: Please do not move in here. Such high prices and terrible living spaces. My dryer door has broke three times now, my roommates toilet seat always falls off, electricity bill is always insanely high no matter how much electricity we use that month, and so on. There are by far better places to live in Bellingham.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Sticky, thanks for your feedback. Elevate had been short-staffed during COVID, which delayed maintenance requests to be filled. However, as of June 2021, we are fully staffed and caught up with all of our maintenance requests! If you ever have any other concerns, please call us!

reviews.author: Isaiah Britt

ownerResponse.text: Hi Rosa, thanks for your feedback. Since we open at 10am - 6pm M-F, the calls that we get before and after that automatically get sent to VM. We apologize for the miscommunication, and hope you find housing that makes you happy!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the kind recommendation! We are glad to hear you enjoy it! If you ever want to see something else get added to the gym, let us know!

reviews.review: Pretty nice student living though they have their problems

ownerResponse.text: Hello Nadia! Thank you so much for the Four Stars! At Gather Bellingham we aim to continuously improve our service and make living at Gather Bellingham an awesome experience. We would love to hear how we can earn that extra star to make it  More

reviews.review: Interesting but most definitely a collage spot.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your review!

reviews.author: Michael Phillips
reviews.review: I love this place moved around a bit and I like it here.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Michael, Thank you so much for your 5 star review! We are  incredibly grateful that you took the time out of your day to leave us this note. All the feedback we receive helps us continue to uphold and improve our residents experience.  More

reviews.author: Linda C
reviews.review: A little expensive but great apts

ownerResponse.text: Hi Linda, Thanks for leaving us such a wonderful honest review. We are incredibly grateful that you took the time out to leave us this note. Our company strongly values resident satisfaction. All the feedback we receive helps us continue to uphold and improve our residents experience. Thank you, once again, for your kind words.

reviews.author: mauri arminen
reviews.review: Very nice

ownerResponse.text: Hi Mauri, Thank you so much for your positive 5 star review! Our staff will always go to great lengths to make sure your stay is comfortable and to your standard. Thanks again for taking the time to leave us a review! If you have any questions please reach out to us! | (360) 474-7845 | elevatebellingham@nelsonpartners.com |

reviews.review: Great place for a college student to live.

ownerResponse.text: We are so proud of Gather Bellingham and thrilled that you love living here! Thank you for the GREAT review! If you need anything, please feel free to give us a call or send us an email. (360)474-7845GatherBellingham@achliving.comGatherBellingham.com
